title: ## Prosody in NLP: A Reading List (2021 and Earlier
This list covers articles exploring prosody in NLP, focusing on its applications and research advancements up to
Acoustic Prosody and Its Role in Natural Language Processing**
This survey explores the role of acoustic prosody in NLP, covering its representation, analysis, and applications
Prosodic Features for Sentiment Analysis**
* **Abstract:** This paper investigates the use of prosodic features for sentiment analysis, demonstrating their effectiveness in enhancing accuracy
Prosodic Modeling for Speech Recognition**
This article discusses the integration of prosodic information into speech recognition systems, leading to improved performance
Prosody in Dialogue Systems**
* **Abstract:** This paper explores the use of prosody in dialogue systems, focusing on its role in natural and engaging interactions
Prosodic Features for Text-to-Speech Synthesis**
This article examines the use of prosodic features in text-to-speech synthesis, contributing to more natural and expressive speech
* **Abstract:** This paper explores the relationship between prosody and emotion recognition, highlighting its potential for applications in human-computer interaction
Prosodic Analysis for Language Identification**
This article investigates the use of prosodic features for language identification, demonstrating its effectiveness in discriminating between languages
* **Abstract:** This paper explores the role of prosody in machine translation, focusing on its impact on translation quality and fluency
Prosodic Features for Speaker Recognition**
This article examines the use of prosodic features for speaker recognition, demonstrating their effectiveness in identifying speakers
Prosody in Speech Synthesis: A Review**
This review article summarizes the state-of-the-art in prosodic modeling for speech synthesis
Prosodic Modeling for Speech Understanding**
* **Abstract:** This paper explores the use of prosodic information in speech understanding systems, leading to improved performance
Prosodic Features for Language Modeling**
This article investigates the integration of prosodic features into language models, enhancing their predictive power
This book explores the relationship between prosody and discourse analysis, providing insights into the role of prosody in communication
Prosodic Features for Automatic Speech Recognition**
This article examines the use of prosodic features in automatic speech recognition, demonstrating their effectiveness in improving accuracy
Prosody and the Perception of Speech**
This book explores the role of prosody in the perception of speech, highlighting its importance in understanding and interpreting language
Prosodic Features for Text-to-Speech Synthesis: A Survey**
This survey article summarizes the use of prosodic features in text-to-speech synthesis, covering various approaches and techniques
Prosody and the Interpretation of Meaning**
This book explores the relationship between prosody and the interpretation of meaning, highlighting its role in disambiguation and understanding
Prosodic Features for Speech Recognition: A Review**
This review article summarizes the use of prosodic features in speech recognition, covering various approaches and techniques
Prosody and the Structure of Language**
This book explores the relationship between prosody and the structure of language, highlighting its role in phonology, syntax, and semantics
Prosodic Features for Speech Synthesis: A Tutorial**
This tutorial article provides an introduction to the use of prosodic features in speech synthesis, covering basic concepts and techniques
This list provides a starting point for exploring the use of prosody in NLP. Remember to search for more recent articles and research papers to stay updated on the latest advancements in this field
